tika.dc.description:
If you LOVE Southern food but don't know how to MAKE it, this is the app for you! With this Vook, you'll get step-by-step instructions for making these mouthwatering recipes. Get "Southern Cooking: The How-To Guide" now and put delicious southern cooking on the menu tonight!

Southern cooking tastes like home. And you don't have to be from the South to appreciate it or to make it! It's hearty, full of flavor, and the perfect treat for family and guests. "Southern Cooking: The How-To Guide" will make you an expert southern cook in eight easy chapters. Roll up your sleeves and learn how to make the foods you've only enjoyed in restaurants and at other dinner tables. You'll learn how to make southern staples such as:

  • Biscuits
  • Candied sweet potatoes
  • Potato soup
  • Country fried steak
  • Turkey pot pie
  • Shrimp and grits
  • Pound cake

      This Vook won't take up any room on the shelf, but soon friends and family will be begging to come over for these...
tika.dc.subject: Cooking
